frontmatter.title: Fusion HCI
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion HCI
description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.
---

import { ActiveServer, ProcessAutomation, Tools } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Fusion HCI provides a fully integrated turnkey platform for running and maintaining all of your on-premises Red Hat OpenShift applications.

</PageDescription>

<Tabs>

<Tab label="Overview">

<PageDescription>

A hyperconverged bare metal appliance that makes it easy to get up and running quickly with OpenShift.

</PageDescription>

#####  

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Quick deployment"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Deploy an enterprise-level OpenShift cluster in less than a week."
    >
    <ActiveServer aria-label="Appliance" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Orchestrated install"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Automated OpenShift installation removes overhead of provisioning."
    >
    <ProcessAutomation aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Proven architecture"
    href="/"
    bodyText="No need to design, build, test, and maintain a custom architecture for an on-prem deployment."
     >
     <Tools aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

#####  

<PageDescription>

Designed from the ground up as an integrated system for delivering resilient OpenShift.

</PageDescription>

#####  

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Clusters on demand"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Host multiple clusters in a single appliance, provisioning clusters on demand."
    >
    <ActiveServer aria-label="Appliance" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Enterprise ready"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Highly available storage and networking protect against hardware failures.  Built in backup and disaster recovery protect against data loss or site outages."
    >
    <ProcessAutomation aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="High performance"
    href="/"
    bodyText="High performance compute, GPUs, storage, and network."
     >
     <Tools aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

###  

<PageDescription>

Watch the video

</PageDescription>

#####  

<iframe width="2452" height="1158" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JijBTRyiw0I" title="IBM Storage Fusion HCI System Overview" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

</Tab>

<Tab label="Resources">

<PageDescription>

More ways to explore

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Articles and blogs</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Videos</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Repositories</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Openshift Data Foundation on IBM Fusion HCI 2.7.1"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/openshift-data-foundation-ibm-storage-fusion-hci-271-dhanashree-patil-hosuf"

  </ResourceCard>
